name: Agencja Reklamowa S4
description: S4 is full service advertising agency, which operates on Polish market since 1998. We offer our clients full support in their marketing activities, such as ATL, BTL, PR, online, mobile, event and non-standard forms of communication. 360 degrees advertising services are our specialties.  A good agency thinks outside the box. A good agency that is looking forward to working with you.
